author: Bowdeya Tweh
title: FDA Orders Mandatory Recall of Companyâ€™s Kratom Products on Salmonella Concerns
text:
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has ordered a recall of all food products containing powdered kratom from Triangle Pharmanaturals LLC after some products were found to contain salmonella.
The federal agency said Tuesday it ordered a mandatory recall after the Las Vegas company failed to cooperate with a request to conduct a voluntary recall. The FDA said the latest action was the first time it issued a mandatory recall on contaminated food products, authority that was extended to the agency as part of the FDA Food Safety...
